title: Emails and texts of Chief of Staff Chris Thompson on April 28, 2023

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All emails sent by Chief of Staff Chris Thompson on his city email account on April 28, 2023
- All text messages sent and received by Chief of Staff Chris Thompson on his official city phone on April 28, 2023

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

title: First 10 emails and texts sent by L.A. Mayor Karen Bass

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- The first ten emails sent by L.A. Mayor Karen Bass in her official email account after talking office
- The first ten text messages sent by L.A. Mayor Karen Bass from her official city phone after talking office

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

title: Fees collected for public records requests by Governor's Office of Open Government

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

- An electronic list of all fees collected for staff time, legal review and other tasks related to fulfilling public records requests in calendar year 2022. 
- The grand total of all fees collected for staff time, legal review and other tasks related to fulfilling public records requests in calendar year 2022.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh
